articles.title: Nifty 50 snaps longest weekly winning run since 2010 with 0.5% drop, 30 stocks end in the red | Stock Market News - Mint
articles.description: Nifty 50 ended today’s session with a drop of 1.7%, closing at 24,717 points, resulting in a weekly decline of 0.50%. This marks the first weekly drop for the index after eight consecutive weeks of gains, with 30 stocks ending the week in the red.
